text: avane, nim'mannu ondu jivadinda srstisidavanu mattu adu sukha padeyalendu adarindale adara joteyannu nirmisidavanu. Munde avanu (purusanu) avalannu avarisidaga, avalu laghuvada garbhavannu dharisidalu mattu adara jote nadedadidalu. Taruvaya adu bharavadaga avaribbaru, ‘‘ninu namage sajjana santatiyannu dayapalisidare navu khandita ninage krtajnaragiruvevu’’ endu tam'ma odeyanada allahanodane prarthisuttare
